declare @tag varchar(32), @hiddenFields varchar(128), @message nvarchar(4000), @dynamicEvents nvarchar(4000)
select @message = '', @tag = substring('@@table', 2, 2) select @hiddenFields = rtrim(hide) from @@sysDatabaseName..voucherinfo where ma_ct = @@id exec @@appDatabaseName..AI_ERP$Generate$DynamicEvents @@controller, @@event, @tag, @hiddenFields, @@id, @@sysDatabaseName, @dynamicEvents out set @message = @message + @dynamicEvents
if (1 = &Tiny.Currency.ConfigEvent; or 1 = &Tiny.External.ConfigEvent;) begin declare @$formFieldAction nvarchar(4000) exec @@sysDatabaseName..AI_ERP$GenerateEvents$FormFieldAction @@controller, @@event, 'sysformfield', '1=0&Tiny.Currency.ConfigCondition;&Tiny.External.ConfigCondition;', '@@appDatabaseName', @$formFieldAction out set @message = @message + @$formFieldAction end
select @message as message
